content.prompt:
"Inasmuch as the regime, because of its rigidity, will find it increasingly more difficult to raise industrial output, it is obvious that the standard of living in many sectors of our society may be threatened."

The statement above was most likely written by a contemporary observer of

choices.label: Nazi Germany after the purge of the SA (stormtroopers)
the Soviet Union at the time of Brezhnev
Great Britain at the time of Margaret Thatcher

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Identify a historical concept, development, or process.
